title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Acknowledging your feelings doesnt require you to act on them. Its possible that your current wariness of others is fueled by distrust you harbor for yourself. The Scorpio New Moon emphasizes your 1st House of Identity, heightening your suspicions of people normally outside of your orbit. But this overly cautious attitude may be rooted in your fear of being unable to defend yourself. Forgive any recent shortcomings and stop listing your faults. Consciously shift your focus to develop new skills when you encounter a weakness. True strength doesnt come from wearing shields of fear, but from the courage to embrace the truth. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
